sentences.en: Seek out your teammates purposefully rather than jumping on every new group project opportunity.
sentences.cn: 有目的地寻找你的队友，而不是抓住每一个新的团队项目机会。

sentences.en: He strode purposefully toward the barn.
sentences.cn: 他有意朝谷仓大步走去。

sentences.en: They moved purposefully through the milling crowd.
sentences.cn: 他们有目的地在乱哄哄的人群里穿行。
